College_Name: Explorra School of Design and Technology, Ahmedabad
College_Summary: Explorra School Of Design & Technology, Ahmedabad, established in 1999, is India’s Premiere Digital Media & Technology Education Organisation. Explorra School of Design has campuses across India, China & Canada. The college offers various Certificate and UG courses. The college has empowered 100,000+ students until now.

College_Name: Transstadia University
College_Summary: TransStadia University, established in 2019 is a private Institute situated in Ahmedabad. TransStadia University offers BBA (Hons) and B.Sc (Hons) at the undergraduate level and offers M.Sc at the postgraduate level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination. The placement cell at Transstadia aims at providing 100% placement assistance to its students.

L J School of Design- Ahmedabad
College_Summary: L J School of Design, Ahmedabad offers a flagship course of B.Des in three specializations at the UG level. The total fee for the B.Des program is INR 6 Lacs. Admission to the L J School of Design is based on the candidate’s performance in the entrance exam conducted by L J University. Some of the top recruiters that recruit students from this institute include Wipro, IBM, Cognizant, Reliance Industries Limited among various others.

College_Name: NIEM The Institute of Event Management Ahmedabad
College_Summary: NIEM The Institute of Event Management is Asia’s first event management institute established in the year 2000. NIEM Ahmedabad is associated with reputed organizations like, CII, EEMA, FICCI, Ad Club, etc. It is accredited by the best International Accreditation Organization (IAO). The institute has been mentioned in the LIMCA BOOK OF WORLD RECORDS and has produced the largest number of event professionals in the world. NIEM India has been nominated twice as India’s best educational institute from all fields by the Economic Time Awards.

JD Institute of Fashion Technology- [JDIFT], Surat
College_Summary: JD Institute of Fashion Technology (JDIFT), Surat offers Diploma and UG courses in the field of Fashion and Design. Admission to the courses are based on candidates' previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit students from JDIFT include Asian Paints, Zara, Tommy Hilfiger, Pantaloons etc.

Parulba ITI College-Himmatnagar
College_Summary: Parulba ITI College, established in 2015 is a private institute that offers 2 different Diploma courses in a wide range of specializations. The institute has a well equipped workshop with proper safety measures. Admission to the courses offered by the institute is based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination. The institute also provides 4 months internship to the students. The students are placed in Government or Private Hospitals, Healthcare centers, Clinics, Pathological Labs, Blood donor centers, Research facilities, Universities and Colleges, Pharmaceutical companies, and others.

International Automobile Centre for Excellence- (IACE), Gandhinagar
College_Summary: International Automobile Centre of Excellence, is a joint initiative between the Government of Gujarat in collaboration with Maruti Suzuki India Limited (MSIL).  The centre is a world-class institute catering to ‘end-to-end’ training, development and research needs of the automobile ecosystem in India. The institute offers B.Sc, PG Diploma and Certificate courses at the undergraduate and the postgraduate level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination. Some of the top recruiters that recruit IACE students include Rane Madras Ltd (RML), Roki Minda, SFC Solutions India (Sealing) Pvt Ltd, Subros Limited, Sunvisors India Pvt Ltd., Toyoda Gosei South India Pvt Ltd etc.

It was founded in 2022 by the Gujarat Government and offers an extensive range of Undergraduate, Postgraduate, Diploma and Doctorate courses in Science, Pharmacy, Engineering, Nursing, Commerce and Management, Education, Education, Law, Arts, and many more.

Institute of Commerce, Nirma University- (ICNU), Ahmedabad
College_Summary: Institute of Commerce is a private college of the Nirma University. The ICNU college offers the flagship course of B. Com (Honors) program at Undergraduate level. Nirma University is ranked among the top 100 institutions in India by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF). Admission to the B. Com program is based on valid scores in previous year qualifying examination. The institute has accomplished an exceptional placement target of 100% for the academic year 2020-21.

College_Name: Institute of Architecture & Planning, Nirma University
College_Summary: Institute of Architecture & Planning, Nirma University, Ahmedabad, Gujarat is a Private Institute.  Institute of Architecture & Planning offers courses at various Diploma and Undergraduate levels. It also offers several certification courses. The Undergraduate courses include B. Voc and diploma courses include a total of 15 specializations. It is affiliated to the Nirma University, Ahmedabad, Gujarat for the Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses. The UGC approves all the relevant programs of the institute. It provides students with a number of different courses in the Architecture stream.

Sarvajanik University
College_Summary: Sarvajanik University is a private university established in the year 2021 by the Sarvajanik Education Society under the Gujarat Private Universities Act 2009. It is approved by UGC, AICTE, BCI,and COA. The institute has eight constituents offering UG, PG, Diploma and PhD programs in the fields of Arts, Business, Commerce, Architecture and Design, Engineering, Law, Management, Science and Humanities. Sarvajanik University has signed MoUs with eight European universities including, Cyprus University of Technology, Technical University of Sofia, Darmstadt University of Applied Sciences, etc. Sarvajanik University offers all the necessary facilities and placement opportunities.

College_Name: Gandhinagar University, Gandhinagar, Gujarat
Faculty of Management Studies, MSU Baroda
College_Summary: Faculty of Management Studies, MSU Baroda also known as FMS Baroda was established in 1984 and is located in Vadodara, Gujarat. It is the management studies wing of the Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda. The institute is a premier center for executive education that is recognized for its role in fostering corporate success and business leadership. Faculty of Management Studies (FMS) courses are approved by AICTE. With the delivery of high-quality, modern education, FMS Baroda aspires to support a business community that is diverse, responsible, and prosperous.

College_Name: Parul University Online, Vadodara
College_Summary: Parul University Online is a Gujarat-based, NAAC accredited (A++ Grade) and leading multidisciplinary destination which came into existence in 2015. It offers a wide range of AICTE accredited Undergraduate, Postgraduate, doctoral and Diploma courses with the support of its amazing faculties and amalgamation of various institutes. The strength of the University lies in its 43000+ national students who come from 28 States and 2500+ international students who hail from 68 foreign countries followed by 500+ Ph.D. Guides, 2,500+ Faculties, 100+ Foreign Partnerships, 20,000+ Placements offers students have secured in 2,500+ Companies, 150+ National Awards & Rankings and 160+ Professors from IITs, NITs, NID & NIFT who have joined the University to provide the best quality education and opportunities to ambitious youths and professionals.

College_Name: Sardar Vallabhbhai Global University, [SVGU], Ahmedabad
College_Summary: Sardar Vallabhbhai Global University (SVGU) is a premier private university carrying forward the legacy of Chimanbhai Patel Institutes. The university came into existence as per Gujarat Private University Act 2009 and offers various courses in the areas of management, computing and journalism. The aspirants can apply for BBA, BBA Honors as well as MBA, along with courses like BCA, BCA Honors, MCA and Integrated MCA. The institute also offers BA, BA Honors, and MA in journalism.
